title: Episode 242: Headlock Cover-up (Feat. Tammy Rivera)
itunes:title: Episode 242: Headlock Cover-up (Feat. Tammy Rivera)
description:
Singer and TV personality, Tammy Rivera, takes time out of her quarantine to join the ladies of Lip Service. Tammy opens up about her desire for another child, watching porn with Waka, and much more. Tammy even shares a story in which her daughter, Charlie, walked in on her and Waka having sex. Make sure to check out Waka & Tammy: What the Flocka on WeTV! Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
